result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew Lucas Myer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Matthew Lucas Myer is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Matthew Lucas Myer was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Apply bond on file and refund balance to payor.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew Lucas Myer

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

ck returned by PO - Unable to Forward. cah
c: Def, Atty, DA & SCSO. eif
signed by Def & Atty this date. eif

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes, DF ATTY: Dan Firkus, DF: Matthew Lucas Myer appeared.  Court called at 10:47 a.m.  Set for PTC.  ADA Nieskes recites the agreement.  DE files a Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights Form with the Court.  Includes case 15CM474, 15CM641 & 15CM643.  Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty.  DE pleads Guilty to Ct 3 in 15CM641.  Court reviews Deputy Eric Johnson's report.  Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE adjudicated guilty of Ct 3 in 15CM641. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 1 & Ct. 2 in 15CM641 & dismisses 15CM474 & 15CM643. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:

Court orders court costs of $443.00 which includes the DNA surcharge for Ct. 3 in 15CM641
- Apply money on file and send remaining balance to the payor
- 20 days to appeal
filed by ADA M. Kelly. gme
filed by Atty. D. Firkus. gme

INCLUDES 15CM474, 15CM641 & 15CM643

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,   Heather D.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

CO: EJL, RPR: Val Deiss, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley,  DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  Matthew Lucas Myer appeared from jail.   Includes 15CM474, 15CM641 & 15CM643.   QUASH WARRANT.  Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG on Cases.  Waives speedy trial. ADA McKinley is requesting CB, Atty Kucinski argues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 16, 2015 at 10:30 am.
